onboarding.slide1desc: Ready to simplify communication with QR? Let's get started with a few simple steps!
onboarding.slide2desc: Create a QR code to share your information, restaurant menu, or pet's information.
onboarding.slide3desc: Easily share your created QR code with your phone number, email, message, or other information. Perfect for car tags, pet collars, or restaurant menus!

authentication.createaccountdesc: Create your account and start managing your QR codes.

login.title: Hello, welcome!
login.desc: Please enter your email address and password to log into your account.

register.registerdesc: Please enter your information to create an account.

fotgotpassword.forgotpassworddesc: Enter your email address below to receive password reset instructions.

pincode.pincodedesc: We have sent you a code to verify your email address. Please enter the code in the field below to proceed with the verification.
pincode.pincodedesc2: Please note that this code will expire 10 minutes after this message. If you do not receive a message or encounter any issues, please contact our support team.

changepassword.changepassworddesc: Please enter your new password and repeat it to confirm.
